sentence.Network_en: Exclusion criteria included pachymetry thinner than 400 μ m and aphakic eyes.
sentence.Network_cn: 排除标准包括角膜厚度小于400μm或者无晶体眼.

sentence.Network_en: Vitreous and retinal surgery poses a risk to corneal endothelium in the aphakic and pseudophakic eyes.
sentence.Network_cn: 为保护角膜内皮,行玻璃体、视网膜手术时应尽可能保留晶体.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To discuss the surgical choice of aphakic retinal detachment ( ARD ) and pesudophakic retinal detachment ( PPRD ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的　探讨治疗无晶状体眼视网膜脱离 ( ARD ) 和人工晶状体眼视网膜脱离 ( PPRD ) 的手术方式选择.
